title: Great Two Bedroom Apartment available for Rent
posting_body: Beautiful remodeled apartment for rent in the Clark Fulton Area.
This apartment has two nice size bedrooms, living room, full bath, and kitchen.
I’m addition this unit has access to the attic which is a large area for storage, etc.
This is part of a duplex and the place has a nice yard and area for outdoor activities.
This unit will not last long, contact for showing and additional details.
